      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_100024</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_100024</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Cross-section of a dry cell</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Querschnitt einer trockenen Zelle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Section transversale d'une cellule sèche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cross-section de uma pilha seca</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sezione trasversale di una pila a secco</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διατομή ενός ξηρού κυττάρου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sección representativa de una pila seca</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the cross-section of a dry cell. It is made up of ammonium chloride, manganese dioxide, carbon, zinc case and carbon rod.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ammonium chloride</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Carbon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">carbon rod</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dry cell</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">manganese dioxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">zinc case</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt den Querschnitt einer 
trockenen Zelle. Sie besteht Ammoniumchlorverbindung, 
Mangandioxid, Carbon, Zinkkasten und Carbonstange.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la section transversale 
d'une cellule sèche. Elle se compose du chlorure d'ammonium, du
bioxyde de manganèse, du carbone, de la caisse de zinc et de la tige 
de carbone.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o cross-section de uma 
pilha seca. É composta do cloreto de ammonium, do dióxido do 
manganês, do carbono, da caixa do zinco e da haste do carbono.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la sezione 
trasversale di una pila a secco. Si compone del cloruro di 
ammonio, del diossido del manganese, del carbonio, della cassa dello 
zinco e dell'asta del carbonio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τη διατομή ενός ξηρού 
κυττάρου. Αποτελείται από το χλωρίδιο αμμωνίου, το 
διοξείδιο μαγγάνιου, τον άνθρακα, την περίπτωση ψευδάργυρου και 
τη ράβδο άνθρακα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la sección 
representativa de una pila seca. Se compone del cloruro de 
amonio, del dióxido del manganeso, del carbón, de la caja del cinc y
de la barra del carbón.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ammoniumchlorverbindung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Carbon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Carbonstange</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">trockene Zelle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pila a secco</string>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
